title: The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing
notes:
The game runs in DX9 mode and OpenGL mode. If after downloading the game doesn't start for you it may mean that it's set to DX11. To change that you will have to run regedit through winetricks:
WINEPREFIX="/home/$USER/.steam/steamapps/compatdata/215530/pfx/" winetricks
There you can select your current wineprefix and then run regedit
You will have to change "StartingDirect3DVersion" under HKEY_CURRENT_USER\SOFTWARE\NeoCore Games\Van Helsing\ to either 9 (for DirectX 9) or to 0 (for OpenGL). 
The game performs somewhat poorly under OpenGL but dropping the settings lower should help. (I didn't test the DX9 renderer yet).

I've tested story mode in multiplayer and my friend playing on windows was able to join my game.
